package.name: Net_DIME
package.summary: The PEAR::Net_DIME class implements DIME encoding
package.description: This is the initial independent release of the Net_DIME package. Provides an implementation of DIME as defined at http://search.ietf.org/internet-drafts/draft-nielsen-dime-02.txt

release.notes: Some of the code probably needs to be PEAR-ified a bit more. This needs to be integrated with streams, if there is anything needed to do that. More testing needs to be done, but it encodes/decodes it's own messages.
